thing-type.label: PIR Motion Sensor Motion Sensor
thing-type.description: Motion Sensor<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtRing Alarm Motion Sensor: Expand your Ring Alarm system to secure each room in your home, and get alerts as soon as they detect motion.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtActivate inclusion mode on controller</li&gt <li&gtPull tab/quickly disconnect and reconnect battery</li&gt <li&gtDevice should appear in Inbox</li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtInitiate exclusion mode on controller</li&gt <li&gtOpen contact sensor’s cover Remove and replace battery quickly</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtReset:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtPress and hold the reset button found under the pinhole on the back of the device.</li&gt <li&gtThe LED of the sensor should begin blinking. Hold the button down until the blinking stops</li&gt <li&gtRemove the cover from your motion sensor.</li&gt <li&gtRemove the battery.</li&gt <li&gtPlace the battery back in the device.</li&gt <li&gtPut the cover back on the device. </li&gt </ol&gt<br /&gt<h2&gtWakeup Information</h2&gt<p&gtBy opening the cover, the sensor will get to tamper state and stay awake.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Dwell Time
parameter.description: Dwell Time<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfigures the “dwell” window or how long the sensor should not be detecting motion before sending the “no motion detected” message. </p&gt <p&gt1 to 9 minutes.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Pet Immunity
parameter.description: Pet Immunity<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtConfigures the “Pet Immunity,” or sensitivity of the motion detection used mostly so only human motion is detected.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Walk Test
parameter.description: Walk Test<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtParameter 4 is used to activate a “walk test” mode to test the PIR motion detection coverage after being installed.</p&gt <p&gtThis mode is active for 15 minutes only after which the sensor returns to normal operation.</p&gt</p&gt
